name: Arcane Spelling
description:
The bureau of magic oversight would prefer if you didn't come up with new dangerous spellings.

But there are monsters attacking you and it is your job to defeat them before they reach you. Maybe you can sneak a few solutions by your overseer.

I am not entirely happy, since I didn't do some things I wanted to explore. And it's obviously not very pretty. But it should work reasonably well.  If it does crash, which it really shouldn't, please leave a comment.

------

made with panda3 https://www.panda3d.org/

during a game jam for https://www.develop.games/
